project.name: registration
project.shortDescription: Seam Registration Example - EAR (including a test project)
project.description: This is a trivial example for the Seam tutorial. It requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x, Seam 2.0 and TestNG plugin. It includes the registration,registration-ejb,registration-ear,registration-test projects.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x
The TestNG plugin is required if you want to run Seam tests. You can install it using the following update site: http://beust.com/eclipse

project.name: registration2
project.description: This is a trivial example for the Seam tutorial. It requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x and Seam 2.0. The example creates the registration,registration-ejb,registration-ear projects. It includes a tutorial.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x

project.name: messages
project.description: This is a simple example of the use of @DataModel for the Seam tutorial. It requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x and Seam 2.0. The example creates the messages,messages-ejb and messages-ear projects. It includes a tutorial.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x

project.name: todo
project.shortDescription: Seam and jBPM: the todo list example - EAR
project.description: This is a simple example for the Seam tutorial, demonstrating the use of jBPM-based business process management. It requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x and Seam 2.0. The example creates the todo,todo-ejb and todo-ear projects. It includes a tutorial.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x

project.name: numberguess
project.shortDescription: Seam pageflow: the numberguess example - EAR
project.description: This is a simple example for the Seam tutorial, demonstrating the use of jBPM-based page flow. It requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x and Seam 2.0. The example creates the numberguess,numberguess-ejb and numberguess-ear projects. It includes a tutorial.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x

project.name: booking3
project.shortDescription: Seam Booking Example - EAR (including a tutorial)
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of Seam in a Java EE 5 environment. Transaction and persistence context management is handled by the EJB container. The example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/JBoss Application Server 4.2.x, Seam 2.0 and TestNG plugin. It includes the booking, booking-ear,booking-test and booking-ejb projects.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x
The TestNG plugin is required if you want to run Seam tests. You can install it using the following update site: http://beust.com/eclipse

project.name: booking22
project.shortDescription: Seam 2.2 Booking Example - EAR (including a tutorial)
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of Seam in a Java EE 5 environment. Transaction and persistence context management is handled by the EJB container. This example has been tested on JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5.0. It includes the booking22, booking22-ear,booking22-test and booking22-ejb projects.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5.0
The TestNG plugin is required if you want to run Seam tests. You can install it using the following update site: http://beust.com/eclipse

project.name: photoalbum
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of RichFaces components. It includes the photoalbum,photoalbum-ear and photoalbum-ejb projects. The example requires Seam 2.2 and JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/5.0 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x/5.x.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 4.3/5.0 or JBoss Application Server 4.2.x/5.x

project.name: dvdstore22
project.shortDescription: Seam 2.2 DVD Store Example - EAR (including a test project)
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of Seam with jBPM pageflow and business process management. It includes the dvdstore22,dvdstore22-ear,dvdstore22-test and dvdstore22-ejb projects.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5.0
The TestNG plugin is required if you want to run Seam tests. You can install it using the following update site: http://beust.com/eclipse

project.name: testjsfportlet
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of JBoss JSF Portlet. It runs on JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 4.3 or JBoss Portal 2.7.x.

fix.property: This project example requires the JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 4.3 or JBoss Portal 2.7.x

project.name: testseamportlet
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of JBoss Seam Portlet. It runs on JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 4.3/JBoss Portal 2.7.x and Seam 2.0.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 4.3 or JBoss Portal 2.7.x

project.category: Portlet for JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x/GateIn 3.1
project.name: JSFPortlet
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of JBoss JSF Portlet. It runs on JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or on GateIn 3.1.

fix.property: This project example requires the JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or GateIn 3.1

project.category: Portlet for JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x/GateIn 3.1
project.name: RichFacesPortlet
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of JBoss JSF Portlet with RichFaces. It runs on JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or on GateIn 3.1.

fix.property: This project example requires the JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or GateIn 3.1

project.category: Portlet for JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x/GateIn 3.1
project.name: SeamPortlet
project.description: This example demonstrates the use of JBoss JSF Portlet with Seam. It runs on JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or on GateIn 3.1.

fix.property: This project example requires the JBoss Enterprise Portal Platform 5.x or GateIn 3.1
This project example requires Seam version 2.2.0
